title: Total assets of HSBC 2007 to 2019
summary: Overall Total assets in billion U.S.dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Total assets in billion U.S.dollars, about 2692.5 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Total assets in billion U.S.dollars about 2364.5 was reached at Year 2009
min_summary: In general Total assets in billion U.S.dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
mid_summary: In general Total assets in billion U.S.dollars has stayed the same over the Year.

Maximum Total assets in billion U.S.dollars, about 2692.5 was reported at Year 2012
